title: DocuSign Agent Tools
description: A toolkit for building AI agents that can interact with DocuSign

body.raw:
# DocuSign Agent Tools

A powerful toolkit for building AI agents that can interact with DocuSign envelopes, documents, and templates.

## Features

- 📝 Core Envelope Operations
- 📄 Document Operations
- 📋 Template Operations
- 👥 Recipient Operations
- 📑 Custom Document Operations
- 📦 Bulk Operations

## Quick Links

- [Getting Started](/getting-started)
- [API Reference](/api-reference)
- [Usage Examples](/usage-examples)

## Installation

```bash
npm install @docusign-agent-tools/core
# or
pnpm add @docusign-agent-tools/core
# or
yarn add @docusign-agent-tools/core
```
